entry.title: He Don’t Want To Be Saved, Don’t Save Him
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,380Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 20

Summary: A serial killer is on the loose in Gotham, and since the press is all over Bruce, it’s harder for him to investigate. When then BAU get a call from the Gotham City Police asking for help, they are more than happy to fly down and help out. Catching a serial killer while all eyes are on him may be hard, but maybe Bruce can put his mind on something else, more like someone else. Preferably the cute FBI agent that has Brucie and the dark knight coming out as one. Bruce is completely lost, and he doesn’t want to be found. Or, a Case Fic with a new ship.

entry.title: Silicon Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: Jigglepanda

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,230Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 6

Summary: Tim Drake was created to obey. A second-generation android with the mind of a child, he existed to serve his creators—but when Drake Industries demanded theft, moral compromise, and silence, Tim made a choice.Watching Gotham from afar, he became fascinated by the Dark Knight and his protégés, studying every movement, every shadow, every rooftop flip. And when the paths of two extraordinary “sons” collided—Damian, the android Robin, and Tim, the AI—he found more than inspiration. He found family.In the shadows of Gotham, Tim must navigate loyalty, morality, and what it truly means to belong.

entry.title: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only an amateur mage can turn your father into one.
entry.summary:
Author: Mildbedframe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,197Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: “B-man? Is that you?" the vigilante asked, walking slowly towards the dog with his hands raised in the air. The dog barked as he kept staring at his first son. "Bark three times if it's you," ordered Dick. The dog barked three times. "Raise your left paw if it's really you," his son told him. The dog raised his left paw. "Do a d-" the vigilantes started. The dog barked at him with the same tone and look Bruce would use when he scolded one of his children. "Geez, okay. I'm sorry! No need to bark at me." Nightwing said as he petted Bruce's head. Or Bruce gets turned into a dog.

entry.title: Why Can't Anything Be Simple?
entry.summary:
Author: Megamagic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,029Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 109

Summary: Green Lantern and Batman are sent to another planet to try to stop a war that would consume a vast part of the galaxy.However in the middle of the mission the planet is attacked by a power hungry species who thrive on war. To protect the lives of everyone on the planet Batman surrenders himself to the leader of the species. Who is fascinated by making the man his pet. The Justice League rush to rescue their teammate but are met with many road blocks along the way. (Be aware this is a WIP and the tags are not updated fully. This is going to be a dark one so please re-check tags with every new chapter I post.)

entry.title: Bruce Goes Batty
entry.summary:
Author: AtlasDaMoth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,885Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 677

Summary: In Bruce Wayne's opinion, as The Batman and Gotham's Billionaire, magic was both incredibly illogical, and quite stupid. Guns, swords, secret plots and evil schemes, he could deal with it all. Except for magic. Spells, curses, it was all unknown to him, and he hated it.He formed that idea on the subject at least a good three years ago. And now, as he stares at himself in the mirror, shaking hands gripping the long bat ears that had sprouted upon his head, he finds himself proven right yet again.Magic. Stupid, stupid magic.

entry.title: Bruce Tries Again(for his children)
entry.summary:
Author: Fr0licking_lillies

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,895Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 55

Summary: ݁₊ ⊹ . ݁˖ . ݁·ꕤ The Bat-boys are turned into kids by a new form of Fear Gas. Bruce decides he wants to try again with them, with trials and tribulation of course. The boys still have their present mindsets, but get occasional kiddy tendencies, which most cannot handle. But nothing their partners can't fix--even if Bruce gives them mad side-eyes--for their loves. ݁₊ ⊹ . ݁˖ . ݁·ꕤ Patrol was supposed to be simple, but instead, Batman found himself on his way to wrangle Scarecrow, and place him under arrest. The alert had been sent while Batman was on his way back to the Wayne manor, so he was last on the scene. “We got a situation, Batman,” Red Robin spoke through the comms. “Hood has been compromised. Going in” Batman’s heart started to speed up. It was alright, his boys could handle themselves. That thought was wiped once the comms cut out with a crackle, Robin’s shout fizzling out, along with a curse from Tim.

entry.title: Operation: Chaos on the Runway
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,580Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 148

Summary: In an epic celebration for reaching 4 million subscribers on Cass and Steph's channel, the duo decides to host a livestream guaranteed to break the internet. Their grand plan? Revealing to the world that the mysterious dancer "C" is none other than Cassandra Cain Wayne. But this revelation barely scratches the surface of the night's most explosive moments. With every family member determined to help celebrate, the fun atmosphere quickly escalates into a wild dance competition - because when have the Waynes ever done anything without turning it into a rivalry? Secretly rehearsed choreographies, ruthless judges, and a side bet about their boyfriends' reaction times turn the night into an absolute spectacle. The Batfamily's legendary intensity meets chaotic fun in this unforgettable livestream event where every move could spark new memes and every reveal sends the fandom into meltdown.

entry.title: Another Perspective
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,651Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 97

Summary: A clash of opposing plans causes Batman to accidentally be doused with a hybrid of not-quite-Fear Toxin and Ivy's pheromones. In order to cope with the opposing influences, his brain convinces him that the four Rogues who were keyed to them - Scarecrow, Ivy, Harley Quinn, and Riddler - have been deaged into children. Obviously he'll have to bring them home and look after them until an antidote is made. Meanwhile, by order of the Batkids in order to NOT break Batman's mind, said Rogues are forced to play along.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply

entry.title: Childish crushes
entry.summary:
Author: Cringe_Fella

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,018Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 861

Summary: Instead of lunging at him, the monster stumbled, as it tried to stand, and Clark saw as a child's leg slipped out of a big black boot before tangling in a yellow belt, small, very childish hands trying and failing to catch it. And maybe… And maybe it wasn't a monster at all, because as Clark watched, transfixed, the kid - because it had to be a kid, he didn't seem to be older than Clark- face planted on the floor without making even a single noise._______Or: a magical mishap accidently turns the World's Finest into an 8 and a 9 year old. Shenanigans ensue.

entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,419Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 148

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.

entry.title: How Far Do Baby Bats Fly?
entry.summary:
Author: Krisrift

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,366Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 1,321

Summary: Bruce is de-aged into that of a child and his kids are there to clean up after him in the most literal of sense. With every layer they peel back of their father figure, their mentor, the more questions they need answered; most pressingly, did this kid not get therapy?or,They knew Bruce Wayne didn't have the most well-adjusted upbringing and had some odd quirks due it, but meeting him as he is now, Bruce might have truly outdone himself here.

entry.title: The Eye of The Storm - Batfam x OC
entry.summary:
Author: Starryeyed56

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,954Chapters: 28/28Kudos: 4

Summary: Aroha originally from Aotearoa, New Zealand gets her life uprooted and moved to Gotham when her dad gets a job at Wayne Enterprise. Her first time out of her home country in a small part of the world to the dark streets of Gotham and a city that seems bigger than she could even imagine. Will her secrets stay hidden in this infamously crime ridden city or will the horrors of Gotham claim another victim... ~~~~~Aroha and her father are my own creation and everyone else belongs to their respective creators. All characters will be aged up and no weird minor stuff will happen!
